proposal: Diving into the Year of the Dragon Utility, it's clear you're all about making transactions smoother with a 2% fee on sales and zero taxes on buys and transfers. With 143 holders on the ETH network, congrats on creating a secure space by renouncing the contract and burning the initial liquidity! Imagine enhancing this community's experience further with our suite of B2B tools. From launching your own DEX to creating a lottery where everyone can share in the revenue, we're here to help your dragon soar even higher. Let's chat about how we can align our tools with your vision, without any fire-breathing!
